Reviews.Title: “A good bargain with challenges”
Reviews.Author: Mom-cat7141
Reviews.Content: Plusses: 1. The room was spotless and comfortable. 2. Breakfast was great. 3. Safe neighborhood. 4. The price was good. Minuses: 1. Very noisy neighborhood at night. 2. Communication with hosts was difficult because of language barriers. 3. Hard to find and quite a ways out, although transportation was convenient.

HotelInfo.Name: The Condottieri
HotelInfo.Address: Via Sampietro di Bastelica 81, 00177 Rome, Italy
